sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Navibar from "../components/Navibar"; import Journey from "../components/Timetable-components/Journey"; import "../components/Timetable-components/journey.css"; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; export default function Booking() { const busJourney = { city: "Colombo", fare: 1100, Name: "Mighty Travels", depature: 10, arrival: 12, seats: 30, }; return (

Booking Page


Ticket

Booking Information Journey Details Bus Name :{busJourney.Name}
Route Number :197
Start : {busJourney.city} at {(busJourney.depature < 12) ? `${busJourney.depature} A:M`:`${busJourney.depature} P:M`}
Destination : Matara at {(busJourney.arrival < 12) ? `${busJourney.arrival} A:M`:`${busJourney.arrival} P:M`} Share the Journey Share this journey with your loved ones or friends so they can be a part of it. Card Title Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.
); }
